document_data.mainbody:
bundance was a special alteration quest spell
When cast, this spell allowed the caster to speed up a harvest or the growth of plantlife within a forest. During casting, the caster stood within the area to be affected and determined the exact shape and size of the spells area of effect. The spell could affect up to  of cropland. For a woodland, the spell caused twenty-five years worth of growth in a single day and could affect up to  of forest.
